description: Pun on addiction to soap and being 'clean'.
title: Soap Saga
n_1: Sam shares a quirky confession with Lee at home.
c1_1: I was really into soap once.
n_2: Lee raises an eyebrow, curious about Sam's past.
c1_2: Yeah, I'd collect and use all sorts!
n_3: Sam nods seriously, recalling his obsession.
c2_3: Did you get help for it?
n_4: Sam grins, ready with his punchline.
